column4: i want to upgrade my dapper drake to edgy eft , i downloaded edgy eft iso & burned it, can i upgrade my system to edgy eft without disturbing my system....
no your looking at alot of breakage and with the servers down you cant fdo it anyway
i got a problem with my apt-get , whenever i try it , it is saying dpkg: error processing acpid (--configure): &  E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code  , any suggestions... ?
is there a reason you sent a link to my pm?
go to gnome-llok.org
go to gnome-look.org
name of the splash screen ?
i dont know there are thousands of them
i like this splash screen very much
abd Shinzetsu|AFK join #ubuntu-offtopic
install xserver-xorg-video-all
also make sure BusID is right
if this was an upgrade you may need more packages.
edgy is fresh installed. btw, what is BusID ?
in /etc/X11/xorg you will see a line under device (driver) BusID PCI:...... that needs to match what pci slot the card is in
/etc/X11/xorg.conf
lspci should give you the busid number
it will look like 02:02:0
not that exact number but should look simular. if you see a letter in there let me know but iirc edgy shows it as it needs to be not in hex dec
there ?
